game.name: Missile Dodge
game.description:
What would be a better idea than flying out an airplane in a sky especially when you want to go on the most thrilling and exciting adventure of your life? We have got you covered with a brand new action-packed game where you can fulfil all your adventure flying needs in just a few clicks. Are you ready friends to explore the biggest adventure online? Join Missile Dodge and be prepared to fly around the sky in your cute and small airplane while dodging the missiles!
The difficulty level will keep increasing since more and more missiles will get ready to be launched as you move to the advanced level. Plane your every move and try every possible effort to keep your plane away from these deadly missiles! They will keep chasing you and your job is to manoeuvre your plane strategically so that they get crashed with each other. Fly your plane by clicking or tapping and holding the screen in this HTML5 shooting game!
Dodge all homing missiles that will try coming towards you before they shoot you down! Use the map to find out the position of your enemy missiles and stars in this fast-paced and addictive 2D shooter! Make these missiles collide with each other and do not forget to grab as many stars as you can to boost your score. This cool flying game features addictive arcade gameplay, shoot flares to attract missiles, and addictive gameplay.
